howItWorks.title: How Plumbit Works
howItWorks.description: A simple, transparent process for everyone.

step1.title: 1. Create a Job Request
step1.description: Sign up and tell us what you need. Describe the issue, upload photos, and choose if it's an emergency or a scheduled job. It's free and takes just a few minutes.

step2.title: 2. Get Matched with a Pro
step2.description: We instantly notify available, certified plumbers in your area. The first available pro will accept your job, and you'll get their details and ETA.

step3.title: 3. Track Your Plumber
step3.description: Follow your plumber's status in real-time from 'En Route' to 'On Site'. You can contact them directly through the app if needed.

step4.title: 4. Pay Directly & Review
step4.description: Once the job is done, you pay the plumber directly—no platform fees. Afterwards, leave a review to help other customers.

step1.title: 1. Create Your Profile
step1.description: Sign up and build your professional profile. Set your service area, availability, and base rates (for customer information).

step2.title: 2. See Available Jobs
step2.description: Get notified about new job requests near you that match your services. View job details, descriptions, and photos before you accept.

step3.title: 3. Accept & Manage Jobs
step3.description: Accept jobs that fit your schedule with a single tap. Update your status as you travel to the site and complete the work, keeping the customer informed.

step4.title: 4. Get Paid Directly
step4.description: After completing the job, collect payment directly from the customer. All your earnings are yours to keep—we don't take a cut.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions below.

q1.question: How much does it cost to use Plumbit?
q1.answer: Using the Plumbit platform to find and request a plumber is completely free for customers. You only pay the plumber for the services they provide.

q2.question: How do I pay the plumber?
q2.answer: Payment is handled directly between you and the plumber. You can pay them via cash, bank transfer, or any other method you both agree upon. Plumbit does not process any payments.

q3.question: Are the plumbers certified?
q3.answer: Yes, we verify the certifications and credentials of all plumbers before they can join our platform to ensure you're hiring a qualified professional.

q4.question: What if I have an emergency?
q4.answer: When you create a job request, you can mark it as an emergency. This prioritizes your request and sends it to plumbers who are available for immediate dispatch.

q1.question: Is there a fee to join Plumbit?
q1.answer: No, it's completely free for plumbers to sign up, create a profile, and receive job leads. We do not charge any subscription fees or commissions.

q2.question: How do I get paid?
q2.answer: You collect payment directly from the customer upon job completion. You keep 100% of what you charge for your services.

q3.question: Can I set my own service area and schedule?
q3.answer: Absolutely. In your profile, you define your service radius and set your availability. You will only receive job requests that match your criteria.

q4.question: How are jobs assigned?
q4.answer: Job requests are sent to all available plumbers in the customer's area. The first plumber to accept the job gets it. This ensures a fast response for the customer and a fair system for our partners.

about.heroTitle: Building a Better Way to Find a Plumber
about.heroSubtitle: Plumbit was born from a simple idea: finding a reliable plumber shouldn't be a stressful emergency. We're using technology to bring transparency, speed, and trust to the home services industry.
about.storyP1: It started with a familiar homeowner's nightmare: a burst pipe on a weekend and a frantic search through outdated online directories. The process was inefficient, stressful, and lacked transparency. We knew there had to be a better way.
about.storyP2: We envisioned a platform that could connect people with certified, available plumbers in minutes, just like ordering a taxi or a meal. Plumbit is the result of that vision—a simple, powerful tool designed to solve real-world problems for both homeowners and trade professionals.
about.missionP1: Our mission is to create the most trusted and efficient marketplace for home services. We're starting with plumbing because it's an essential service where speed and reliability are critical.
about.missionP2: For our customers, we promise a fast, transparent, and safe way to find help. For our plumber partners, we offer a free, flexible platform to find more jobs and grow their business on their own terms. We don't take a commission—we're here to make the connection.
about.valuesSubtitle: These principles guide every decision we make as we build Plumbit.
about.value1Desc: We verify every plumber on our platform to ensure they are certified, insured, and reviewed by the community. Your peace of mind is our top priority.
about.value2Desc: We believe finding a plumber should be easy. Our platform provides clear job requests, real-time tracking, and direct communication, removing the usual hassle.
about.value3Desc: By connecting local homeowners with skilled local professionals, we help strengthen community ties and support small businesses.
